content.rendered:
The list is back! that’s right, Community Events, Salesforce events, big Partner events, track them all in ONE PLACE! Below is the Google Sheet for Salesforce Events 2022, same style as 2017-2021 holding more and more events each time. If you have an event you want to add to the list (I try to aggregate them best I can from across the community but I know I’m not perfect and need some Ohana help now and again 😉) please use the form here.

Events List

Calendar & Link

Let’s say you want more than a Google Sheet, you can add the Salesforce Events calendar to your calendar as well. All events listed on the Community Events Google Sheet are posted on the calendar as well. To add to your Google Calendar do the following:

  • Go to your Google Calendar.
  • On the left, next to “Other calendars,” click Add   
  • Click Subscribe to calendar.
  • In the “Add calendar” box, drop the link for the calendar
  • Press Enter and Viola!

Calendar Import Link: https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/lek0mb3i5gaep07l9sl2agnt40%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics

Google Form

If you want to submit your event because you either have it scheduled or have a new event in the ecosystem, you can use the form here.

Add your event to the Salesforce Events list using this form here!

  • Salesforce Events 2023
  • November 22, 2022
  • In "Ohana"
  • Salesforce Events 2020
  • February 19, 2020
  • In "AwesomeAdmin"
  • Salesforce Events 2018
  • December 21, 2017
  • In "Ohana"

excerpt.rendered: If you’re interested in the Salesforce Events of 2022 find them here. Community, Partner, and Salesforce run all in one place!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2023
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The list is back for year 6! that’s right, Community Events, Salesforce events, big Partner events, track them all in ONE PLACE!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Salesforce Events 2020 is live!! That's right Ohana, it wouldn't be my blog if I wasn't talking about events and how we connect and get together as humans.  For real, we get out from behind the keyboard, and even leave the HOUSE!!! I know, it's crazy, but for Ohana,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2018
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Find out about the 2018 Salesforce Event, when they are and where. Link to the 2018 Salesforce events calendar and form for to submit updates and new events

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2021
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce 2021 events calendar with Community run Dreamin events, bootcamps, Salesforce run events, and more

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Me When I Present at the World Tour Chicago
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join me in Chicago 6/15 3 pm, when I present at the Salesforce World Tour on Communities!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Features You Need To Contact Salesforce For
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ever wonder what features you need to contact Salesforce to activate or deactivate? Check out the community doc and submit other features you have learned require Salesforce Support.
